titles.title: Two Strike Act
Two Strike Act
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to include in the definition of the term "aggravated felony" a criminal violation committed by an alien who unlawfully entered the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Two Strike Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include in the definition of "aggravated felony" a criminal violation committed by an alien who improperly entered the United States.
